channel.title: Humanities: Recently added blogs and sub-categories at ooh.directory

image.title: Humanities: Recently added blogs and sub-categories at ooh.directory

item.title: anthro{dendum}
item.description:
“A group blog devoted to ‘doing anthropology in public’ — providing well-written relevant discussion of sociocultural anthropology that everyone will find accessible.”
Started in 2005.
Average 1,028 words.
item.content:encoded:
“A group blog devoted to ‘doing anthropology in public’ — providing well-written relevant discussion of sociocultural anthropology that everyone will find accessible.”

Started in 2005. Average 1,028 words.

item.title: Zettelkasten knowledge and info management
item.description:
“A Zettelkasten is a personal tool for thinking and writing that creates an interconnected web of thought. Its emphasis is on connection and not mere collection of ideas.”
By Sascha Fast, Christian Tietze.
🇩🇪 Started in 2013.
Average 1,246 words.
item.content:encoded:
“A Zettelkasten is a personal tool for thinking and writing that creates an interconnected web of thought. Its emphasis is on connection and not mere collection of ideas.” By Sascha Fast, Christian Tietze.
